metadata.titel_preek: Es ist noch nicht erschienen, was wir sein werden

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The movement from the current state of hiddenness and 'not-yet' to a future state of being like God (seeing Him as He is) through the indwelling of Love.

tekstueel_bewijs: Ich senk mich in dich hinunter
Wir müssen uns angewöhnen, ihn jeden Tag neu zu besetzen

zender.identificatie: The Prophetic/Mystic Tradition (represented by Bloch, John, Eckhart)
tekstueel_bewijs: Die eine Stimme ist die der prophetischen Tradition, die andere die der mystischen
Was ihr von Anfang an gehört habt
die Wohnung, die dir von Anfang an geschenkt ist
ich will die Erde umgraben und ihn düngen

tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is primarily the structural logic of the world (market) and the psychological state of the self.

secundair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The ethical realization of God's love through human action in the world.
secundair_narratief_programma.subject: The Believer ('We')
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: Mysticism (Primary) and Prophecy (Secondary) are described as inseparable; one cannot exist without the other.

voorbeelden_god_subject: Gott hat jeden und jede von uns in seinem Bild erschaffen
voorbeelden_mens_subject: Ich senk mich in dich hinunter

voorbeelden: Was ihr von Anfang an gehört habt, das soll in euch bleiben
Gott hat keine anderen Hände als unsere

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is a recruitment of the will (Utopian hope) and an awakening of desire (Mysticism).

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From the 'Not-yet' (S2) to the 'Already' (S1) and back to the 'Not-yet' as a motor for action.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: Synthesis: Mysticism provides the 'Staying' that fuels the 'Becoming' of Prophecy.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Moderate; Judgment is replaced by the 'Schmerz' of the current state.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While using high mystical language, the structural engine is anthropocentric: God is 'dependent' on human hands and love is a task 'we' must inhabit.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Gott ist angewiesen auf die Liebe, so wie wir es sind.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Human as primary actor of change
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Wir müssen uns angewöhnen, ihn jeden Tag neu zu besetzen

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: die Wohnung, die dir von Anfang an geschenkt ist

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: The Gardener in Jesus' parable is used as a model for the 'still-not' attitude.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Christ is the Gardener who digs around the soul when it is dead.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Empowerment/Pressure to 'stay in love' and 'not give up'.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Synergism: God and Man work together, with God providing the 'space' and Man providing the 'action'.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: Strong integration of philosophical hope and mystical indwelling.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Bleiben ist ein Wort für das mystische Einssein

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit is largely replaced by the concept of 'Love' as a shared atmosphere.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Moderate; sin is 'being caught in the self' or 'the market'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon shifts God from Subject to Object/Helper. Man is the Subject who must 'stay' and 'act'.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: Man is the subject of 'staying' and 'seeing'.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: God as the one who holds the believer in the 'staying'.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Instead of 'We must inhabit the word', use 'The Word inhabits us and will not let us go'.

identificatie_herstel.problematische_identificatie: Hearer as the 'Gardener' who saves the tree.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Identify the hearer as the unfruitful tree being tended by Christ.

modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Emphasize that the 'ability' to love is a miracle performed by God, not a habit to be trained.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Address the 'Feind Gottes' (Enemy of God) aspect more deeply as a condition only God can solve.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: To make Grace truly 'Grace' and not just 'Fairness'.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A beautiful, poetic synthesis of Bloch and John, but structurally risks making God a tool for human ethical utopianism.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, it is inclusive ('we'); actantially, it is demanding ('we must').
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis focuses on the Johannine 'remain'; semiotics reveals who is doing the 'remaining'.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Reveals that 'God is Love' is used as a Helper-actant rather than a Subject-actant.

appendices.notities: The sermon leans heavily on the 'Theology of Hope' (Moltmann/Bloch) which naturally prioritizes the Subject's movement toward the future.
